snippet.title: SAGA 5: The Count walkthrough (Apple II - Adventure international)
snippet.description:
You awake in a large brass bed in a castle somewhere in Transylvania. Who are you, what are you doing here and WHY did the postman deliver a bottle of blood?

The Count  (http://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/count) was a graphics adventure game published by Adventure International in 1982 for the Apple ][. It is the fifth adventure game of the Scott Adams Graphic Adventure series. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

This game was very difficult to find. Thanks to 4AM for sharing it with everyone!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Image - 4AM
Cover art - www.mocagh.org
Walkthrough - www.solutionarchive.com (Jacob Gunness)
